summary: When reporters are granted access to Area 51 Air Force base, a breach of security turns the protected government base into a horrifying destination of terror.
cast: Tammi Arender|Randy Austin|Jillian Batherson|Bruce Boxleitner|Vanessa Branch|Beau Brasseaux|Sean Paul Braud|Lena Clark|Ivan Djurovic|J.D. Evermore|Ryan H. Jackson|Damon Lipari|Jason London|Jed Maheu|Rachel Miner|Bruce Sanders Jr.|Andrew Sensenig|Luke Sexton|John Shea|Billy Slaughter|Rob Steinberg|Julius Gregory|Ned Yousef|VyVy Nguyen|Todd Owens|Mark Rayner
keywords: low budget sci fi movie|area 51|reporter|air force|alien
